column4:
['Aye deewana jaise jata hai', '
Ha deewana jaise jata hai', '
Zanjeere todke', '
Arey murga nikal gaya', '
Mera darbe ko chhod ke', '
To padoshan, arey to', '
Padoshan apni murgi ko', '
Rakhna sambhal mera', '
Murga huya hai deewana', '
Ha padoshan apni murgi', '
Ko rakhna sambhal', 'Mera murga huya hai deewana', '
Kya kahu kya kya kahu', '
Kya huya hai kamal', '
Mera murga huya hai deewana', '
Oye padoshan apni murgi', '
Ko rakhna sambhal', '
Mera murga huya hai deewana haye haye', 'Aagan mein dhode wo khote pe bhage', '
Arey dhode re dhode bhage re bhage', '
Ha aagan mein dhode wo khote pe bhage', '
Diware kude nahi hath lage hai muhle me', '
Hai muhle me jaise dhamal', '
Mera murga huya hai deewana', 'Padoshan apni murgi ko rakhna sambhal', '
Mera murga huya hai deewana', '
Arey padoshan apni murgi ko rakhna sambhal', '
Mera murga huya hai deewana haye haye haye', '
Murga huya hai deewana diwan deewana', '
Arey chonch me murgi ka par', 'Aadha idar aadha udar do dilo pe hai asar', '
Aadha idar aadha udar', '
Arey murga murgi ka deewana', '
Aur mai deewana tera hu tera hu tera hu', 'Ho kai gujare san ha kai gujare san', '
Tera tnkhasingh ke liye the sun tere ghongaru', '
Ha gaya sina than gaya dil bhi chhin', '
Yuhi bole chham tere ghungaru tere ghungaru', '
Arey isiliye to aaj isiliye to aaj me', '
Pubil liye samjhata hu', 'Ki padoshan apni murgi ko rakhna sambhal', '
Mera murga huya hai deewana', '
Ha padoshan apni murgi ko rakhna sambhal', '
Arey mera murga huya hai deewana', 'Samjh samjh ke samjh ko samjho', '
Samjh samjhana bhi ek samjh hai', '
Samjh samjh ke samjh na samjhe', '
Meri samjh me wo na samjh hai', 'Samjh samjh ke samjh ko samjho', '
Samjh samjhana bhi ek samjh hai', '
Samjh samjh ke samjh na samjhe', '
Meri samjh me wo na samjh hai', 'Ha janeman janejigar kabhi dekhe na idar', '
Julm ki bat kare mujhse yu ghat kare', '
Kahe tu koi nahi jake ab mar bhi kahi', '
Humse tu pyar na kar waqt bekar na kar', '
Aapke sar ki kasam bewafa hai wo sanam', 'Bewafa hai wo sanam ha', '
Kya sunau me bewafa yaar ki yaar ki ha', '
Kya sunau me bewafa yaar ki yaar ki', '
Jo nahi bat mane pyar ki pyar ki', 'Arey ek din apna bhi ek din apna bhi', '
Din aayega aayega ha aayega', '
So sunar ki ha ek luhar ki', '
Arey isiliye to mai kahta hu', '
Aakhiri bar kahta hu ki please', 'Please please please arey', '
Padoshan apni murgi', '
Ko rakhna sambhal', '
Mera murga huya hai deewana', '
Arey rakhna sambhal', '
Murgi murga huya deewana', '
Arey padoshan apni', '
Murgi ko rakhna sambhal', '
Mera murga huya hai deewana', 'Rakhna sambhal rakhna sambhal', '
Rakhna sambhal rakhna sambhal', '
Padoshan apni murgi', '
Ko rakhna sambhal', '
Mera murga huya hai deewana.']
